Trample, lifelink

When The Never-Die Jones Memorial Ride enters the battlefield or is defeated, destroy up to one target noncreature artifact and create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

cards.card_name: A Long Drive Off a Short Pier
cards.rules_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack a Race as though creatures you control had haste.)[/i]
When A Long Drive Off a Short Pier enters the battlefield or is defeated, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature an opponent controls.

Menace
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn. X is that creature's power.
• Put X +1/+1 counters on Anus Insanus.
• You draw X cards and you lose X life.
• Create an X/X black Mutant creature token.
